t: DeWalt - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - The DeWalt Industrial Tool Company is an American worldwide manufacturer of power tools and hand tools for the construction, manufacturing and woodworking industries, as well as home craftspeople. DeWalt is a registered trademark of Black & Decker (U.S.) Inc., a subsidiary of Stanley Black & Decker.

t: What is the difference between Black & Decker and DeWalt tools? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 13): DeWalt is a much higher quality of tool compared to Black&Decker. I have personally used both in my business and DeWalt is far better. I believe the Black &Decker brand is more for the weekend warrior type person.

t: Dewalt or Black and Decker - RedFlagDeals.com Forums
s: Having said that I would go Dewalt if choosing between these two specific brands for a drill. A drill is a go to item which you should get a lot of use from, so pick the better brand. If you use a toll very infrequently then perhaps another brand even mastercraft, but not a big fan of black and decker...

t: Stanley Black & Decker - DEWALT, CRAFTSMAN and BLACK+DECKER Win 2023 Popular Mechanics Yard & Garden Awards
s: Stanley Black Decker (NYSE: SWK), the world's largest tool and outdoor company, announced today three of its iconic brands, DEWALT®, CRAFTSMAN® and BLACK+DECKER®, had products chosen as category winners in this year's Popular Mechanics Yard Garden Awards .
